Title: MSP Toolkit
Description:
Some controls and utilites maded by MSP.
Including:
[TrialHelper| Trial Helper]
IsolatedStorageHelper
TileGeneratot
Single-byte encodings (e.g. Windows1251)
HomeWiki:
WP7 toolkit provides some helpers, utilities, behaviors and controls made by Russian Microsoft Student Partners.
Available as a NuGet package:

Includes:
  • TrialHelper
  • IsolatedStorageHelper
  • HTMLTextBox
  • HTMLViewer
  • TileImageGenerator:


  • Behaviors:
    • SwitchFocusOnKeyPressBehavior
    • TextBoxWatermarkBehavior
    • WebBrowserHtmlPropertyBehavior
  • ImageGenerator
  • Single-byte encodings:
    • windows1250 — Central and East European Latin
    • windows1251 — Cyrillic
    • windows1252 — West European Latin
    • windows1253 — Greek
    • windows1254 — Turkish
    • windows1255 — Hebrew
    • windows1256 — Arabic
    • windows1257 — Baltic
    • windows1258 — Vietnamese
    • windows874 — Thai
